article:
Liangliang is a lovely boy. He lives with his grandparents _ Hefei, Anhui Province. When he _ 2 years old, his parents died   in a car accident. He could play the piano when he was 3, and he could play very _ . But two years ago, there was _ wrong with his right hand. He couldn't play at all .
 _ the help of his grandmother, Liangliang could _ many words with his left hand. And now he _ write very well. He is _ . Many people love him very much.
